pr_title: Fix builds to work on fresh Ubuntu 18.04 instance

timeline.message:
Use tar to preserve file permissions in artifact
Use python3.7 when calling nuitka

timeline.bodyText: Should verify that this does not break OSX Builds.
timeline.author: brendongo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,4 +3,4 @@
 # sgrep-lint single executable must be run from the folder with all the shared objects
 
 THIS_DIR="$(dirname "$(realpath "$0")")";
-LD_PRELOAD="/bin/sgrep-lint-files:/usr/local/bin/sgrep-lint-files" ${THIS_DIR}/sgrep-lint-exe "$@"

replies.bodyText: Tried locally setting up sgrep-lint and it looks like everything is ok?
replies.author: brendongo

replies.bodyText:
Confirmed this branch works with make && make install && sgrep-lint --help
Nice!
replies.author: ievans
